welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tabarre, Haiti! This vibrant city is known for its rich history, beautiful beaches, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tabarre has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: La Maison Restaurant
restaurants.description: La Maison Restaurant is a restaurant located in Pòtoprens.

restaurants.name: 5 Coins Restaurant
restaurants.description: 5 Coins Restaurant is a cajun and creole restaurant located in Tabarre 36.

restaurants.name: Point Chaud
restaurants.description: Point Chaud is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Le Relais de Chateaublond
restaurants.description: Le Relais de Chateaublond is a restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: L'Appetit
restaurants.description: L'Appetit is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussaint Louverture International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Toussaint Louverture International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
